about_the_game:
Manage your company and create your mobile devices: smartphones, tablets, processors and OS


Mobiles Tycoon is a brand new game about creating your mobile devices: smartphones and tablets. In the game you have to manage your company and develop your devices (smartphones and tablets), operating systems and processors. Research new technologies, upgrade your office and your factory, hire the best employees, invest in marketing, or save money and buy one of the computer giants!


Mobiles Tycoon gives you almost complete freedom of action. Create smartpones and tablets from scratch by selecting the desired characteristics and design. The game has a lot of features that are not found in other games of this genre, such as Smartphones Tycoon or Devices Tycoon: detailed statistics of your company and products, intelligent algorithms for evaluating products and behavior of companies, interactive operating systems created by the player that you can test.


Also in the game there are:

* 3000+ technologies for research

* Challenging mode for fans of economic strategies

* Smart behavior of competitors, automatic development and release of products

* The ability to run the OS on your gaming smartphone

* 10 levels of office improvement with beautiful 3D models

* Many ways to invest your money, including buying companies, marketing, paid employee search

* Many smartphone designs

* Cloud synchronization

Have a good game!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mojave 10.14
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs

name: Mobiles Tycoon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable GPUs
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Mobiles Tycoon is a brand new game about creating your mobile devices: smartphones and tablets. In the game you have to manage your company and develop your devices (smartphones and tablets), operating systems and processors
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Indonesian, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian
